import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import logoImg from '../../assets/images/logo.svg' import landingImg from '../../assets/images/landing.svg' import studyIcon from '../../assets/images/icons/study.svg' import giveClassesIcon from '../../assets/images/icons/give-classes.svg' import purpleHeartIcon from '../../assets/images/icons/purple-heart.svg' import api from '../../services/api' import './style.css' function Landing() { const [totalConnections, setTotalConnections] = useState(0); useEffect(() =>{ api.get('connections').then(response =>{ const { total } = response.data; setTotalConnections(total); }) }, []) return (

Sua plataforma de estudos online.

Estudar Dar aulas
Total de {totalConnections} conexões já realizadas
) } export default Landing;
